definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: mixed stuff (perh. of Egypt. origin; Kn der. from Copt. saht, woven, + nudj, false (Peyron:Lex 224. 133), and thinks orig. [[שַׁעַטְנׁז]]; LXX has ki/bdhlov spurious);—a kind of cloth forbidden for garments; defined De 22:11 by [[חֶמֶר וּפִשְׁתִּים יַחְדָּו]], and Le 19:19 (H) by [[כִּלְאַיִם]].
